data.title: Connect Adapters
data.description:
You can collect and correlate information about your assets by using Axonius' adapters, which integrate with a wide array of security and IT management solutions.

Go to the Adapters screen to connect at least three adapters to fetch data for your devices and users from at least three different sources.

data.title: Examine a device profile
data.description:
You can examine the details about your devices by looking at their profiles, which displays the data that Axonius collected and correlated from multiple sources.

Use the Devices screen or the search bar on Axonius Dashboard to search for a device and examine its profile.

data.title: Save a query
data.description:
You can identify security gaps by running and saving a query about your assets.

Use the Query Wizard on the Devices screen to create a query, then save it so you can easily access it in the future.
